translations.user_profile_tab_3_form_data_3_text: Choose a unique password to protect your account Choose a password that is difficult to decipher
translations.text_home_1_1: Document management or document management, is the set of technical standards and practices used to manage documents of all types, received and created in an organization, facilitate the recovery of information from them, determine the time that documents should be saved, delete those that no longer serve and ensure the long-term preservation of the most valuable documents, applying principles of rationalization and economics.
translations.text_home_1_2: It is an activity almost as old as writing, which was born due to the need to 'document' or set administrative acts and legal and commercial transactions in writing to attest to the facts. These types of documents were successively embodied in clay tablets, papyrus sheets, scrolls and paper, whose management became increasingly complex as the size of the documentary funds grew.
translations.title_home_2: Â¿What is an Electronic File Document Management System - SGDEA?
translations.text_home_2_1: Information and telecommunications technologies are introducing new practices and ways of managing documents and have become a fundamental tool for access, consultation, transparency, optimization and availability of information. However, it is necessary to establish clear policies regarding the production, distribution, consultation, retention, storage, preservation and final disposition, since each decision associated with the processing of said documents will have effects on the documentary heritage. The industry has evolved, technologies have matured and through this process of maturation new concepts and acronyms have been incorporated, each with different purposes and meanings.
translations.text_home_1_2_1: If you want to know how the correspondence module works and all its functionalities press the button
translations.text_home_1_3_1: If you want to know how the file module works and all its functionalities press the button
translations.text_home_1_4_1: If you want to know how the workflow module works and all its functionalities press the button
translations.app_conglomerado_form_registrar_estado_d: If this option is activated, it represents that the cluster is visible in the system and operations can be performed between each of the corresponding modules of the application. Otherwise, the cluster is not removed from the system, it will only be inactive and invisible for each of the corresponding modules in the system.
translations.app_conglomerado_modal_actualizar_estado: If this option is activated, it represents that the cluster is visible in the system and operations can be performed between each of the corresponding modules of the application. Otherwise, the cluster is not removed from the system, it will only be inactive and invisible for each of the corresponding modules in the system.
translations.app_conglomerado_modal_Actualizar_alert_: Error, the cluster is already assigned.
translations.app_conglomerado_modal_eliminar_informac: Confirm the code to remove the cluster
The conglomerate will be permanently removed
translations.app_conglomerado_modal_eliminar_alert_er: Error, the code is not valid to delete the cluster.
translations.app_conglomerado_import_step_1_descripci: Download the data import format template (Link). Open the file, proceed to fill in the fields indicated in the format and save the changes.
translations.app_conglomerado_import_step_2_descripci: If you want to import a flat file, you must indicate the field separator. If the first record in the file contains the titles you must check the 'Titles' check.
translations.app_conglomerado_import_step_3_descripci: Click on the âSelect fileâ option and select the data import format file to which I add the required fields. Click on the 'Upload information' option.
translations.app_conglomerado_import_form_titulos_lab: (The first record contains the column titles)
translations.app_conglomerado_import_form_file: Select file in the required extension
